item.description:
NEWS:
Meagan will be running the group (Thanks M!)
She will be there around 6:15p, and is looking forward to seeing everyone.

See you next time,
Reece
-----
Hello everyone!

This month, the Meetup is changed to Wednesday 12/21 (NOT Thursday)

Let's meet in December to practice speaking English. Bring your grammar questions, or any books you think are helpful. We'll start with introductions or an icebreaker...activity to be decided later.

Hope you can join us!
See you there!

Reece

The group will meet on the first floor of the Library, in the large reading room to the left of the Information Desk. We usually sit at one of the tables near the entrance, on the left.
If you don't find the group, you can ask the Information Desk for the 6:15 Meetup Group for English Conversation.
Have fun!

For more information, see http://www.bpl.org...

group.name: The Boston English as a Second Language Meetup Group

item.name: Boston ESL Meetup Wednesday 6:15p!
